[BRUSH ZONES AND SCHEDULE (Updated for 2026)](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/public-works/sanitation/)

![sidebar-main](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/sidebar-main.jpg)Cradled by the Eagle Ford Shale Formation to the west and Corpus Christi to the east, Robstown enjoys a one-of-a-kind attraction to industry, commercial investment, and residential development alike. With a deep sense of history, the people of Robstown take pride in their simple but honest roots and are proud to put in an honest day’s work. We appreciate your interest in Robstown and we look forward to visiting with you… at the Crossroads of South Texas.

[Robstown’s History](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/history/) | [Robstown’s City Charter](https://www.cityofrobstown.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Robstown-City-Charter.pdf)

[Robstown Code of Ordinances](https://ecode360.com/RO6460) | [Tax Sale Properties](http://taxsales.lgbs.com/)
